text: Kagra negrera mofa mani'nanankino, negrera'a nevenku'ene mofavre'araminkura zamagote'zmanteno avresra huzmante'nea a'mofo mofa mani'nane. Hagi kagra kanunknahe'mofo nezmaganaga mani'nanankinka, zamavenenehe'ine mofavre'zmigura zamagote'zmante'za zamavaresra hunezmantaza a'nemokizmi nezmaganaga mani'nane. Hagi negrera'a Hiti a' manigeno negafa'a, Amori ne' mani'ne.
